content.text: Write down the coordinates of point \(B\)
On the grid, plot point \(C\) at \((-2, 3)\)
Points \(A\) and \(B\) are plotted on the grid
Find the number of minutes in \(4\frac{1}{2}\) hours
Write down the mathematical name of this solid
Cheng spins a fair 6-sided spinner numbered 1 to 6
On the probability scale, draw an arrow \((\downarrow)\) to show the probability that the spinner lands on 4
For this list of numbers find
Work out the value of \(t\) when \(r = 18\) and \(u = 4\)
Work out the difference between these two temperatures
The temperature at \(7 \text{am}\) is \(5^{\circ}\text{C}\) higher than the temperature at midnight
The probability that it rains tomorrow is 0.47
Find the probability that it does not rain tomorrow
From this list, write down the number that is both a prime number and a factor of 195
Put a ring around each of the symbols that make this statement correct
Insert one pair of brackets to make this statement correct
The diagram shows two parallel lines intersecting a straight line
These are the first four terms of a sequence
Find the next term in this sequence
These are the first four terms of a different sequence
She takes another test and her mean score is now 68
Work out her score in the sixth test
Nina changes 153 euros into dollars when the exchange rate is \(\$ 1 = 0.9\) euros
The area of this trapezium is \(96 \text{cm}^2\)
He sells it at a loss of \(15\%\)
Calculate the selling price of this computer
Calculate the radius of a circle with circumference \(26\mathrm{cm}\)
By writing each number in the calculation correct to 1 significant figure, find an estimate for the value of
Find the interior angle of a regular 7-sided polygon
Without using a calculator, work out \(\frac{11}{12} +\frac{3}{4}\)
You must show all your working and give your answer as a mixed number in its simplest form
Show that the value of \(y\) is 5.9, correct to 2 significant figures
